      • incrementArray

        public static java.lang.Object[] incrementArray(java.lang.Object[] array,
                                                int amount)
        Increments the arrays size.
        Parameters:
        array - The array to largen
        amount - The numer of indexes to add to the array, can be negative to remove indexes from the array.
        Returns:
        The new array incremented by the amount
